name: Linslipinv
tagline: Linear multi time-window earthquake slip inversion with k^-2 smoothing
body:
### Project description
The project consists of several subprojects that share parts of the codes.

#Calculation of Green's functions using Axitra (see `src-dw` directory):
```
$ ./firststep
$ ./calculate
```

### Support or Contact
Contact me via email gallovic@karel.troja.mff.cuni.cz.
You are also welcome to check out my webpage at http://geo.mff.cuni.cz/~gallovic.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
